/opt/cray/pe/gcc/12.2.0/bin/c++ -fPIC -O3 -DNDEBUG -shared -Wl,-soname,libpsztime.so -o libpsztime.so CMakeFiles/psztime.dir/src/utils/timer_cpu.cc.o CMakeFiles/psztime.dir/src/utils/timer_gpu.cc.o  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.5/cuda/12.4/targets/x86_64-linux/lib: /opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.5/cuda/12.4/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart.so -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib64/librt.so
